name: Sederhana
vicinity: Jl. Raya Padang - Indarung No.28 Padang

reviews.text: Fast service, good taste of food, large and comfort place to enjoy the food, the price is good also for this food.
High quality food, not to spicy. Ideal for people who could not handle very spicy sambal
My dad said this place was packed for a reason. After tasting the heavenly delicious minang food, I could see why
Very famous padang style restaurant in Padang. So far they do not have any branch yet. Very popular and crowded
